channel.title: Challenge on Piotr Wachulec
channel.description: Recent content in Challenge on Piotr Wachulec

item.title: '#100Commitow' challenge
item.description: Hi! From the 1st of March 2024, I’ve started a new journey - #100Commitow challenge. It’s a challenge to develop an open-source project constantly over 100 days. I will work on a project called ‘VM Start/Stop’. I’m going to share my progress on my YouTube channel. I’m going to share my thoughts, my struggles, and my successes. I’m going to share my knowledge and experience. I’m going to share my journey with you!
